Vendor.description: The name of the vendor who issued the invoice

Description.description: A description of what the invoice is for

Invoice Number.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the invoice

From Email.description: The email address of the company who issued the invoice

From Address.description: The mailing address of the company who issued the invoice excluding newlines

Date Issued.description: The date the invoice was issued

Payment Due Date.description: The date payment is due, or the date issued if the payment is due upon receipt

Amount.description: The numeric amount for the total amount due for the invoice with two decimal places

Currency.description: The three digit currency code for the total amount due
